mapper.insert: INSERT INTO selling(sellno, productno, memberno) VALUES(sell_seq.nextval, #{productno}, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT s.sellno, p.productno, p.title, p.price, p.thumb1, p.rdate, p.stateno, p.cnt FROM selling s LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON s.productno = p.productno WHERE s.memberno=#{memberno} ORDER BY sellno DESC

SELECT s.sellno, p.productno, m.memberno, m.id, p.title, p.price, p.thumb1, p.rdate, p.stateno, p.cnt FROM selling s, product p, member m WHERE (s.productno = p.productno) AND (s.memberno = m.memberno) AND p.memberno=#{memberno} AND p.stateno=1 ORDER BY sellno DESC

SELECT s.sellno, p.productno, m.memberno, m.id, p.title, p.price, p.thumb1, p.rdate, p.stateno, p.cnt FROM selling s, product p, member m WHERE (s.productno = p.productno) AND (s.memberno = m.memberno) AND p.memberno=#{memberno} AND p.stateno=2 ORDER BY sellno DESC
